name: asyndetic
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
showing or relating to asyndeton (= the act of missing out conjunctions between words or parts of a sentence): "They come to the city seeking wealth, power, fame," said the speaker, using an asyndetic turn of phrase. An asyndetic coordination is a construction that has no conjunction between the components when one is usually there, as in "I came, I saw, I conquered."
